Question: Berlin Partner for Business and Technology GmbH CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Berlin Partner for Business and Technology GmbH

CES 2024 Product Highlight:

- Berlin and Brandenburg jointly represented at CES with a focus on AI/robotics, mobility, and IoT
- 13 co-exhibitors showcased, setting a new record
- Focus on automotive technologies, e-mobility, software solutions, and charging infrastructure
- Regional Transformation Network for the Berlin Brandenburg Region (ReTraNetz-BB) represented
- Joint stand managed by Berlin Partner and the Chamber of Industry and Commerce
- Participating companies include ad modum GmbH, Amphiprion GmbH, Automotive Artificial Intelligence (AAI) GmbH, DAI-Labor / TU Berlin, Deep Safety GmbH, Hubject, pi4_robotics GmbH, Peregrine.ai, Sixfab GmbH, The Drivery GmbH, Wgroup GmbH, wheel.me, and Würth Elektronik eiSos GmbH & Co.KG
Summary_cn:
柏林商务和技术伙伴有限公司

CES 2024产品亮点：

- 柏林和勃兰登堡共同参展CES，关注人工智能/机器人技术、移动性和物联网
- 13家共同参展商，创下新纪录
- 关注汽车技术、电动出行、软件解决方案和充电基础设施
- 代表柏林-勃兰登堡地区的区域转型网络（ReTraNetz-BB）到场
- 由柏林商务伙伴和工商会管理的联合展台
- 参展公司包括ad modum GmbH、Amphiprion GmbH、汽车人工智能（AAI）GmbH、DAI-Labor/TU柏林、Deep Safety GmbH、Hubject、pi4_robotics GmbH、Peregrine.ai、Sixfab GmbH、The Drivery GmbH、Wgroup GmbH、wheel.me和Würth Elektronik eiSos GmbH & Co.KG
